Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/Bloomingdale
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temp. rerouted via Narragansett, Grand, Austin, North Ave and Ridgeland; near Narragansett/Bloomingdale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, Grand, Austin, North Ave and Ridgeland: due to, street blockage near Narragansett/Bloomingdale.

Allow extra travel time.
